apps.name: Garage Door Opener

apps.description: Severe weather alerts by push notification as well as by flashing LED strip. Requires Smart Room Controller - http://build.smartthings.com/projects/smartkitchen/

apps.name: Wemo (Connect)

apps.name: Working From Home
apps.description: If after a particular time of day a certain person is still at home, trigger a 'Working From Home' action.

apps.name: Enable User Codes
apps.description: User Codes

apps.name: Turn me off quick
apps.description: Designed to turn off something after it's turned on with in a given number of seconds.  Works just like Power Allowance, but lets you specify be seconds instead of minutes.  Good possible use is to turn off an outlet used with a relay as a garage door opener shortly after triggering the outlet.

apps.name: Use Buttons As PIN Input
apps.description: (Assign a multi-button controller (e.g., Aeon Labs Minimote) to be a security 'PIN code' input pad,  + which triggers a switch, lock, mode, or Hello Home action.)

apps.name: Humidity is too low/high
apps.description: Sends push/text message when humidity is too low/high.

apps.name: The Flasher
apps.description: Flashes a set of lights in response to motion, an open/close event, or a switch.

apps.name: Forgiving Security
apps.description: Alerts you if something happens while you're away.  Has a settable grace period to compensate for presence sensors that may take a few seconds to be noticed.

apps.name: Hello, Home Phrase Director
apps.description: Monitor a set of presence sensors and activate Hello, Home phrases based on whether your home is empty or occupied.  Each presence status change will check against the current 'sun state' to run phrases based on occupancy and whether the sun is up or down.

apps.name: 5-2 Day Thermostat
apps.description: Weekday and Weekend Thermostat

apps.name: Server Room Thermostat
apps.description: Save energy on power up and down of compressor by creating an upper threshold and a lower threshold. The unit would should turn on the compressor at the upper threshold then cool to the low

apps.name: Low Battery Alert
apps.description: This app will poll selected devices that use a battery and send an alert when the level reaches a specified threshold.

apps.name: Home Alone
apps.description: Turn on random lights for random periods of time to mimic normal behavior while away from home.

apps.name: Greetings Earthling NEST/SRC
apps.description: Sets Nest to present and flashes notifications on Smart Room Controller LED strips in addition to push notifications and mode changes. Requires Smart Room Controller for LED strip functionality - http://build.smartthings.com/projects/smartkitchen/

apps.name: Notify Me With Hue
apps.description: Changes the color and brightness of Philips Hue bulbs when any of a variety of SmartThings is activated.  Supports motion, contact, acceleration, moisture and presence sensors as well as switches.

apps.name: Double Tap Switch for 'Hello, Home' Action
apps.description: Execute a 'Hello, Home' action when an existing switch is tapped twice in a row.

apps.description: PEQ multi-way On/Off Switch - This SmartApp uses a modified PEQ door open/close sensor wired to SPDT (3-way) switch to toggle on and off a GE Link Light, similar light or switch.   The intent is to have a simple and inexpensive battery operated replacement for a standard wall switch to operate a single, 3-way or multi-way zigbee or zwave light or switch.

apps.name: Power Is Out
apps.description: Alert me of power loss using motion detector's change from wired-power to battery-power. SmartThings hub and internet connection must be working! You can connect the hub and internet connection device (e.g. modem, router, etc.) to a battery backup power strip so that the motion detector and detect the loss and the hub and router will still have enough power to get the message out before they fail as well.

apps.name: Smart Ceiling Fan
apps.description: Monitor temperature and humidity, and if it gets too warm or muggy, crank up the old ceiling fan. Activates a dimmer-controlled fan (e.g. Leviton 3-way) on motion, optionally on door open, stops on inactivity for defined number of minutes, or on door close. Uses specific Temperature and Humidity monitors (e.g., Aeon Multisensor, Thermostat, SmartWeather Station, etc.), optionally calculates & uses Heat Index. Temp/heat index defines settable fan speeds (hotter = faster).

To use 1) Set the mode, 2) Change switches and setpoint to where you want them for that mode, and 3) Install or update the app. Changing to that mode or touching the app will set the devices to the saved state.

What separates this SmartApp from other notification SmartApps is that it will only send a notification if your carpool buddy is not with you. If the person you are picking up is present, and has been for 5 minutes or more, they will get a notification when you become present.

apps.name: Notify Doorbell and Turn on Lights
apps.description: SmartApp designed for very specific use-case.  My personal application of a door contact senses a closed state when the doorbell is pushed.  When this happens, send a notification.  Additionally, if it is dark out, turn on lights for duration time.

apps.name: Turn a relay switch on and then off when presence is detected

apps.description: Allows individual lock codes.

apps.name: Knock Knock
apps.description: Do something when small vibrations are detected.  This app triggers an action when an acceleration sensor activates, but also suppresses the activation if there is a combined contact sensor in an open state (such as with the SmartSense Multi).  This way the app only triggers on a door knock, and not a door open.

apps.name: On/Off Toggle Switch Using a Modded PEQ Moisture Sensor
apps.description: PEQ On/Off Switch - This SmartApp uses a modified PEQ moisture sensor wired to a SPST switch to toggle on and off a GE Link Light, similar light or switch.   The intent is to have a simple and inexpensive battery operated replacement for a standard wall switch to operate a single zigbee or zwave light or switch.

apps.name: Smart Lights
apps.description: Allows for creating smart light devices that intelligently control the combination of a smart switch and smart bulb(s).

apps.name: Something Left Open
apps.description: Alerts you when a contact sensor has been left open for a specified number of minutes. Alerts are in the form of a user-defined message that is provided as a push notification to the user's mobile device. Additional optional notifications can be sent by: (1) SMS message, (2) BEEPing a device, and/or (3) Pushover notification (http://pushover.net/). This is great for monitoring refrigerators, freezers, gates, doors, and windows. Save energy or keep your family and pets secure with this SmartApp.

apps.name: Turn It Off After
apps.description: Turns a switch off a set number of minutes after it was turned on.

apps.description: Connect to Ubi Portal

apps.name: Dark Weather
apps.description: Monitors weather for rain and changes house into night mode during the day. When the rain is done, house will change back to daytime mode and can turn the lights off. If the rain stops after sundown, the house will remain on night mode.

apps.name: Lock single user code management
apps.description: Add and Delete Single User Codes for Locks

apps.name: Sonos Mood Music
apps.description: Plays a selected song or station.

apps.name: Opening Door Toggles Switch
apps.description: Use your door as a switch. Go into a room to turn the light on, when you leave it shuts off after you go.

apps.name: Green Smart Thermostat
apps.description:
Try and save power by using alternate thermostat profiles for modes: Away, Home and Night automatically. Used for semi-smart thermostats that can handle these ranges.
Use with Away detection as well as day/night detection apps.

apps.name: Late Arrival
apps.description: Turn on lights when arriving home after sunset.

apps.name: Smart Humidifier
apps.description: Turn on/off humidifier based on relative humidity from a sensor.

apps.name: Mode Change Notify
apps.description: Sends a notification when a mode change occurs

apps.name: Goodbye Ubi
apps.description: An app to coordinate bedtime activities between Ubi and SmartThings.  This app will activate when a Virtual Tile is triggers (Setup custom behavior in Ubi to turn on this tile when you say goodbye to ubi).  This app will then turn off selected lights after a specified number of minutes.  It will also check if any doors or windows are open.  If they are, Ubi will tell you which ones are open.  Finally, the app will say goodbye to hello home if requested.

apps.name: Hue (Connect)
apps.description:
Allows you to connect your Philips Hue lights with SmartThings and control them from your Things area or Dashboard in the SmartThings Mobile app. Adjust colors by going to the Thing detail screen for your Hue lights (tap the gear on Hue tiles).

Please update your Hue Bridge first, outside of the SmartThings app, using the Philips Hue app.

apps.name: When Car Arrives
apps.description: Opens specified garage door and turns on lights when presence detected and the door is closed.

apps.name: Weather Windows
apps.description: Compares two temperatures  indoor vs outdoor, for example  then sends an alert if windows are open (or closed!). If you don't use an external temperature device, your zipcode will be used instead.

apps.name: Sunrise/Sunset
apps.description: Changes mode and controls lights based on local sunrise and sunset times.

apps.name: Garage Door Open - Turn on Light
apps.description: When the garage door opens turn on the selected light(s) and optional only when the sun has set.

apps.name: Turn on with motion unless turned off
apps.description: Any motion detected will turn the lights on unless the switch has been manually switched off recently.

apps.name: Big Turn ON
apps.description: Turn your lights on when the SmartApp is tapped or activated.

apps.name: Pushover Flood Alert!
apps.description: Flood Alert with Pushover Notifications

apps.name: Sonos movie
apps.description: Play a movie message through your Sonos.

apps.name: Arrival-based Night Light with Smart Auto-off
apps.description: Turn a light on when arriving if it's dark outside, then turn it back off after a period of time if they haven't been manually turned off already.

apps.name: Lock It After A While
apps.description: Locks a lock after a given period of time of being unlocked.

apps.name: Maintain Thermostat Temperature Difference
apps.description: Maintains temperature difference between floor temperatures. For example: I have a third floor A/C unit which cannot maintain a cooler tempurature than the bottom units (or else it just runs and runs).

apps.name: Smarter Motion Lights
apps.description: Turn your lights on when motion is detected unless you turn them off!

apps.name: Ubi Goodnight Check
apps.description: This app uses three virtual tiles and any number of open/close sensors as well as lights.  One virtual tile will be turned on by UBI, which still trigger the program to run.  The three things will happen: A.) If any doors are open, the second virtual tile will be turned on.  This will cause UBI to warn that a door is open. B.) If any windows are open, the third virtual tile will be turned on.  This will cause UBI to warn that a window is open. C.) after a five minute wait, all specified lights and the three virtual devices will be turned off.

apps.name: My 3D Print Is Ready
apps.description: It sends a push notification or a text message when the printer stops vibrating.

apps.name: Virtual Thermostat - Nest without a Nest
apps.description: A virtual thermostat for homes not compatible with Nest. Get enhanced control over your heating and cooling devices with temperature readings from multiple sensors, mode-based thermostat settings, and if you have a humidity sensor, feels-like temperatures. Based on the original Virtual Thermostat and Green Thermostat apps.

apps.name: Welcome home notification
apps.description: Notify using Sonos when somebody comes home, and a door is opened

apps.name: Smart Night Light - Dimmable
apps.description: Smart night light but with dim option.

apps.description: auto open close garage door

apps.name: Talking Alarm Clock
apps.description: Control up to 4 waking schedules using a Sonos speaker as an alarm.

apps.name: Notify If Left Unlocked
apps.description: Send a push or SMS notification (and lock, if it's closed) if a door is left unlocked for a period of time.

apps.name: Lighting Director
apps.description: Control up to 4 sets (scenarios) of lights based on motion, door contacts and illuminance levels.

apps.name: Foscam Turn Off LEDs with Mode Change
apps.description: Disables Foscam LED when the mode changes to the selected mode.

apps.description: This SmartApp allows you to interact with the switches in your physical graph through Curb.

apps.name: The Big Switch
apps.description: Turns on, off and dim a collection of lights based on the state of a specific switch.

apps.name: Doors & Windows Reminder
apps.description: Monitor continuously if a set of doors or windows are open. And if they are, send a periodic reminder.

apps.description: Turns on a switch when a contact sensor opens, turns off when closed or after given period

apps.name: Pollster
apps.description: Poll or refresh device status periodically.

apps.name: Hallway light at night
apps.description: Turn a dimmer light on at a low level if it isnt on already for a few minutes when motion is detected during a given time period. Example use would to be turn on a hall light at a low percentage at time when someone gets up to use the bathroom at night.

apps.name: Pushbullet Notifier 1.2.1
apps.description: For use with @625alex's pushbullet device: https://github.com/625alex/SmartThings/blob/master/devices/Pushbullet.groovy It will push a message to the pushbullet device you specify.

apps.name: Mode Set, Returning Home
apps.description: Sets smart house mode when someone returns home using current day of the week, sun state, and time.

apps.name: Control Switch Based Upon Play Status
apps.description: Turn things on and off based upon the play status of a media player

apps.name: BatteryLevelMonitor
apps.description: (Monitor battery level and send push messages  + when a battery is low)

apps.name: Auto-Lock the door
apps.description: Lock the door if it is closed X minutes after unlock

apps.name: Once a Day
apps.description: Turn on one or more switches at a specified time and turn them off at a later time.

apps.name: Alfred Workflow
apps.description: This SmartApp allows you to interact with the things in your physical graph through Alfred.

apps.name: Individual Change Thermostat
apps.description: Setup unlimited adjustments to the thermostat(s), install this app once for each change you want to make

apps.name: Life360 (Connect)
apps.description: Life360 Service Manager

apps.name: Keep Me Cozy II
apps.description: Works the same as Keep Me Cozy, but enables you to pick an alternative temperature sensor in a separate space from the thermostat. Focuses on making you comfortable where you are spending your time rather than where the thermostat is located.

apps.name: Smarter I'm At Home Simulator.
apps.description: This program will turn on and off random light(s) to give a better illusion that you are home.

apps.name: x-way on/off toggle switch for modded PEQ Door Open/Close Sensor
apps.description: PEQ On Off Switch - This SmartApp uses a modified PEQ Door open/close sensor wired to SPDT (3-way) switch to toggle on and off  a switch, a GE Link Light or similar light or switch.   The intent is to have a simple and inexpensive battery operated replacement for a standard wall switch to operate a single, 3-way or x-way zigbee or zwave light or switch.

apps.description: When presence is detected and the time is after sunset, turn on the lights. Designed for turning on exterior lights when arriving home at night.

apps.name: On when open, then off Sunset/Sunrise only
apps.description: Turn on a light when a door opens, then then optionally turn it off a set number of minutes later.  Only turns on between sunset and sunrise.

apps.name: Lock It When I Leave
apps.description: Locks a deadbolt or lever lock when a SmartSense Presence tag or smartphone leaves a location.

apps.name: Has Barkley Been Fed?
apps.description: Setup a schedule to be reminded to feed your pet. Purchase any SmartThings certified pet food feeder and install the Feed My Pet app, and set the time. You and your pet are ready to go. Your life just got smarter.

apps.name: Lock it at a specific time
apps.description: Make sure a door is locked at a specific time.  Option to add door contact sensor to only lock if closed.

apps.name: Simple Rules Engine
apps.description: Simple rules engine for Smart Things

apps.name: Virtual Dehumidifier
apps.description: Turns on a humidifier when humidity gets too high, back off when it reaches the target again.

apps.name: Goodnight Ubi
apps.description: An app to coordinate bedtime activities between Ubi and SmartThings.  This app will activate when a Virtual Tile is triggers (Setup custom behavior in Ubi to turn on this tile when you say goodnight to ubi).  This app will then turn off selected lights after a specified number of minutes.  It will also check if any doors or windows are open.  If they are, Ubi will tell you which ones are open.  Finally, the app will say goodnight to hello home if requested.

apps.name: GeTHR
apps.description: This app tracks various huddle rooms and conference rooms and updates the system when they become empty or occupied

apps.name: Turn It Off When Not in Use
apps.description: Turns off device when wattage drops below a set level after a set time. Retires every 10min

apps.name: Unlock when Garage Door Opens
apps.description: App is designed to unlock an interior door when a Garage Door is opened, then optionally relock it a few minutes later only if the app unlocked the door.

apps.name: Hello Door Lock Code
apps.description: Changes to a specified mode or runs a Hello Home action depending on door unlock code

apps.name: Humidity Trend Sample
apps.description: Sample on how to check for a humidity trend between readings and act if the trend rises or falls by threshold percentage points

apps.name: Weather Underground PWS Connect
apps.description: Connect your SmartSense Temp/Humidity sensor to your Weather Underground Personal Weather Station.

apps.name: Turn something off when a contact opens
apps.description: Turns something off when a contact is opened

apps.name: Portable Switch turns on other device
apps.description: This is app is designed to allow a portable switch  (In my case, a non-load zwave switch that is hardwired to a plug meaning I can move it around and plug into any outlet) to act as a controller of another device, such as an outlet or switch.  The portable switch is then turned off right away.Possible uses include using a portable switch along side a bed to give you a way to turn on an overhead light from your bed.  Or turn on an outlet from your couch.

apps.name: Light Follows Me If There Is No Light
